function.name: extract_gas_stove_features
function.description: Extracts structured gas-range features from Persian Google search results.

capacity.description: Number of burners on the stove (e.g., 3, 4, 5).

type.description: Oven-stove (has oven), Oven-cabinet (no oven, طرح فر).

technology.description: Gas-Only = gas burners + gas oven; Gas-Electric = gas burners + electric oven.

smart.description: SMART if device supports Wi-Fi/app/IoT; otherwise NOT-SMART.
